attributes.description: Contact the Group 1 Sales team by filing in the form, we typically call you back within a few minutes. Look out for our call from the 27 600 number. We can offer you the best finance options to suit your needs. No need to sell your car privately, we offer fair and transparent trade in prices. One of our Sales consultants can come too you in the comfort of your own home or at your place of work so that you can view the car in a nonpressurized environment. We can arrange Nationwide delivery. All our cars undergo a Multipoint mechanical check to insure the best peace of mind. Become a part of the Group 1 Family today TsCs Apply. Call us on 021 903 0500
